title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8126.01 - City of Rochester
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8126.01 - City of Rochester

State Regulations
(a) Cumberland

Street between St. Paul Street and Joseph Avenue. (b) Joseph Avenue between Cumberland Street
and Nassau Street. (c) Nassau

Street between Joseph Avenue and Hudson Avenue. (d) Lexington Avenue between Route 390 and

Mount Read Boulevard. (e) Mount

Read Boulevard. Mount Read Boulevard and its frontage roads between Driving

Park Avenue and I-490. (f) Emerson

Street between Lee Road and Norman Street. (g) Norman Street between Emerson Street and

Lexington Street. (h) Lee Road
between Emerson Street and Lexington Street. (i) Lincoln Avenue between Route 33A (Chili

Avenue) and Copley Street, provided that this route shall only be used between
the hours of 6 p.m. and 10 p.m. (j) Copley Street between Lincoln Avenue and Stanton Street, provided that this
route shall only be used between the hours of 6 p.m. and 10 p.m. (k) Stanton Street between Copley Street and

Wells Street, provided that this route shall only be used between the hours of
6 p.m. and 10 p.m. (l) Wells Street
between Stanton Street and a point 300+- feet west of Stanton Street, provided
that this route shall only be used between the hours of 6 p.m. and 10
p.m. (m) South Clinton Avenue
between IR 490 and Court Street. (n) Court Street between South Clinton Avenue
and Exchange Street. (o) Exchange

Boulevard between Court Street and Flint Street. (p) Violetta Street between Exchange Street
and a point 400+- feet east of Exchange Street. (q) South Avenue between Court Street and IR
490. (r) Plymouth Avenue between
the Inner Loop and Exchange Boulevard, provided that this route shall only be
used between the hours of 7 a.m. and 7 p.m. (s) Flint Street between Exchange Boulevard
and a point 400+- feet east of Exchange Boulevard. (t) Cairn Street between Route 33A (Chili

Avenue) and a point 0.5+- mile north of Route 33A (Chili Avenue). (u) Dewey Avenue between Lyell Avenue and a
point 1000+- feet north of Lyell Avenue. (v) Plymouth Avenue from Lyell Avenue to

Lorimer Street. (w) Lorimer Street
from Plymouth Avenue to Fulton Avenue. (x) Fulton Avenue from Lorimer Street to

Phelps Avenue. (y) Phelps Avenue
from Fulton Avenue to Lake Avenue. (z) Lake Avenue from Phelps Avenue to Lyell

Avenue. (aa)

Driving Park Avenue
between Mount Read Boulevard and LaGrange Avenue. (ab)

Oak Street between Lyell Avenue and a
distance of 0.2 mile south of Lyell Avenue. (ac)

Winton Road. Winton Road between Blossom

Road and University Avenue, provided however, that this route shall only be
used between the hours of 10:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m. (ad)

University Avenue. University Avenue
between Winton Road and Rockwood Street, provided however, that this route
shall only be used between the hours of 10:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m. (ae)

Rockwood Street. Rockwood Street between

University Avenue and a point 0.1+- mile north of University Avenue, provided
however, that this route shall only be used between the hours of 10:00 a.m. to
3:00 p.m. (af)

Culver Road. Culver

Road between I-490 and Atlantic Avenue. (ag) Atlantic Avenue. Atlantic Avenue between Culver Road
and a point 0.3+- mile west of Culver Road. (ai)

Goodman Street. Goodman Street between
I-490 and Anderson Avenue. (aj)

Anderson Avenue. Anderson Avenue between Goodman Street and a point 1,500+-
feet east of Goodman Street. (ak)

Ames Street. Ames Street between Route I-490 and Syke Street. (al)

Syke Street. Syke Street between Ames

Street and a point 200 feet east of Ames Street. (am)

Boxart Street. Boxart Street between

Lake Avenue and point 0.2+- mile east of Lake Avenue. (an)

Lake Avenue. Lake Avenue between Boxart

Street and Maplewood Drive. (ao)

Maplewood Drive. Maplewood Drive between Lake Avenue and Route 104. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8126.01

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
